Class GraphPackClient

java.lang.Object

      graphpack.GraphPackClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module
Direct Known Subclasses:
RmiGraphPackClient
public class GraphPackClient
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule

An abstraction of a GraphPack client (bridge design pattern)
used in order to contact GraphPack services remotely

Author:
amitport
